        password - is the password provided for login
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • addUniversity

        public int addUniversity(java.lang.String school,
                         java.lang.String state,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String control,
                         int numStudents,
                         double percentFemale,
                         double SATVerbal,
                         double SATMath,
                         double expenses,
                         double percentFinancialAid,
                         int numApplicants,
                         double percentAdmitted,
                         double percentEnrolled,
                         int academicsScale,
                         int socialScale,
                         int qualityOfLife)
        Calls the addUniversity method from AdminController passing the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        school - is the name of the school
        state - is the state that the school is located
        location - is the type of area in which the school is located (i.e. Suburban, Small-city, ...)
        control - specifies who controls the university (i.e. Public, Private, ...)
        numStudents - is the number of students at this university
        percentFemale - is the percentage of females at this university
        SATVerbal - is the average SAT Verbal score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        SATMath - is the average SAT Math score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        expenses - is the annual tuition for this university
        percentFinancialAid - is the percentage of students who received some sort of financial aid from this university
        numApplicants - is the number of students who typically apply to this university
        percentAdmitted - is the percentage of students who are admitted annually to this university
        percentEnrolled - is the percentage of students who are currently enrolled at this university
        academicsScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of academics at this university
        socialScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of the social life at this university
        qualityOfLife - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the overall quality of life at this university
        Returns:
        int tells admin the status of adding the university

      • editUniversity

        public int editUniversity(java.lang.String school,
                          java.lang.String state,
                          java.lang.String location,
                          java.lang.String control,
                          int numStudents,
                          double percentFemale,
                          double SATVerbal,
                          double SATMath,
                          double expenses,
                          double percentFinancialAid,
                          int numApplicants,
                          double percentAdmitted,
                          double percentEnrolled,
                          int academicsScale,
                          int socialScale,
                          int qualityOfLife)
        Calls the editUniversity method from AdminController and passes it the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        school - is the name of the school
        state - is the state that the school is located
        location - is the type of area in which the school is located (i.e. Suburban, Small-city, ...)
        control - specifies who controls the university (i.e. Public, Private, ...)
        numStudents - is the number of students at this university
        percentFemale - is the percentage of females at this university
        SATVerbal - is the average SAT Verbal score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        SATMath - is the average SAT Math score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        expenses - is the annual tuition for this university
        percentFinancialAid - is the percentage of students who received some sort of financial aid from this university
        numApplicants - is the number of students who typically apply to this university
        percentAdmitted - is the percentage of students who are admitted annually to this university
        percentEnrolled - is the percentage of students who are currently enrolled at this university
        academicsScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of academics at this university
        socialScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of the social life at this university
        qualityOfLife - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the overall quality of life at this university
        Returns:
        int tells admin the status of editing a university

      • deactivateUser

        public int deactivateUser(java.lang.String username)
        Calls the deactivateUser method from AdminController and passes it the specified parameter
        Parameters:
        username - is the username of the user being deactivated
        Returns:
        int representation of the deactivation, 1 if successful, -1 if failure

      • adminEditUser

        public int adminEditUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String firstName,
                         java.lang.String lastName,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         char type,
                         char status)
        calls the adminController to edit a user
        Parameters:
        username - the users username
        firstName - the users desired firstname
        lastName - the users desired lastname
        password - the users desired password
        type - the type of user
        status - the status of the account
        Returns:
        int the status of the edit

      • addNewUser

        public int addNewUser(java.lang.String firstName,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      char type)
        Calls the addNewUser method from AdminController and passes it the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        firstName - is the first name of the new user
        lastName - is the last name of the new user
        username - is the username of the new user
        password - is the password of the new user
        type - is the type of new user
        Returns:
        int true if username is unique

      • deleteUser

        Parameters:
        username - is the username of account being deleted
        Returns:
        int representation of deletion
